This version2 has the following changes:
* FF1 - newly remastered sound using Chris's Dynamic Compressor on the movie and Level Speech on the riffs (V1 was a mux of a non-bsg4you riff mix)
* FF1 - the movie's dynamic range is higher and the riffs are quieter and in line with movie dialog
* FF1 - the video bit rate for v1 was 3000Kbps while v2 is 2300Kbps (it looks the same)
* FF2 - newly remastered sound using Chris's Dynamic Compressor on the movie and Level Speech on the riffs
* FF2 - the movie's dynamic range is higher, its fidelity is better and the dialog is louder and more closely matches the riffs
* FF2 - the video bit rate for v1 was 4000Kbps while v2 is 2300Kbps (it looks the same)
* FF2 - the chapter times were slightly adjusted

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies, the subs and the chapters.
